doc.title: Blazing Lazers
doc.plot: You're in for the fight of your life, Space Jockey! In Blazing Lazers you are seated at the helm of 80 tons of awesome firepower-a Gunhead Star Fighter- and you've just run into the ruthless Dark Squadron. Dangerously close to Earth, they threaten to destroy it with eight super-weapons. Only you and your Star Fighters blazing lazers and bombs stand between them and certain destruction. You'll need more than straight shooting to fight your way out of this one.
